backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: AboutSection component creation, white border on KC logo, and logo mockup image addition to portfolio gallery.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend component files describing their structure, styling, and functionality within the navy-blue and gold themed design portfolio website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining OKLCH color system for light and dark themes, including navy, gold, and utility color definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with basic meta tags, title 'Kaur's Creation', root div, and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component rendering the complete single-page layout with Header, HeroSection, AboutSection, ServicesSection, PortfolioSection, TestimonialSection, and Footer on navy background.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying designer bio text with gold heading and white text on navy background, positioned between Hero and Services sections.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with contact information (email, phone), social media links (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp), additional services text, and caffeine.ai attribution in navy and gold theme.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with KC logo featuring white border, smooth scroll navigation buttons, and scroll-based shadow effect on navy background with gold hover states.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with 'Elevate Your Brand' headline, descriptive text, gold CTA button, and autoplay looping logo reveal video in a two-column grid layout.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioSection: Masonry-style portfolio gallery displaying 24 images including logo mockup at top, with consistent 4px white borders and navy/gold hover effects in responsive column layout.
Services section displaying 11 design services (logo, business card, flex, brochure, etc.) in a responsive grid with icons and hover effects on white background.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialSecti: React component displaying a testimonials section with 5 client reviews in a responsive grid layout, featuring navy blue cards with gold accents and 5-star ratings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages ICP backend actor creation with authentication support, automatically recreating the actor when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining navy blue and gold luxury color palette using OKLCH color space, custom utility classes, typography settings with Inter and Playfair Display fonts, and Tailwind base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with navy/gold color palette, custom fonts (Inter, Playfair Display), OKLCH color definitions, enhanced shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the luxury graphic design studio website architecture with navy/gold aesthetic, listing implemented features including sticky header, hero section, services grid, portfolio gallery, testimonials, and footer components.
